pageTitle: UPDATE – Prime Minister’s itinerary for Sunday, May 8, 2022 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Note: All times local

Kyiv, Ukraine

Private meetings

The Prime Minister will arrive in Kyiv, Ukraine.

The Prime Minister will tour Irpin, Ukraine.

The Prime Minister will participate in an event at the Embassy of Canada to Ukraine.

The Prime Minister will hold a bilateral meeting with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

6:00 p.m. The Prime Minister will participate in a G7 Leaders’ meeting on the war in Ukraine.

Closed to media

The Prime Minister will hold a joint press conference with the President of Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy.

Note for media:

  • Pooled coverage
